name: pwd
longDescription: Print the full filename of the current working directory.

options.name: logical
options.description: If the contents of the environment variable ‘PWD’ provide an absolute name of the current directory with no ‘.’ or ‘..’ components, but possibly with symbolic links, then output those contents.  Otherwise, fall back to default ‘-P’ handling.

options.name: physical
options.description: Print a fully resolved name for the current directory.  That is, all components of the printed name will be actual directory names—none will be symbolic links.
